values.description: The call butterfly strategy is the combination of a bull call spread and a bear call spread. The call butterfly can be long or short.
values.keywords: call butterfly, bull call spread, bear call spread, profits from low volatility, profits from high volatility, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, risk of early assignment
